trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection> contains the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> objects in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection>包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>中的对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve an instance of this class through the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以检索通过控件的此类的实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The collection maintains a reference to the control through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.DataGridView%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 集合保留的引用控制通过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.DataGridView%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To improve performance, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection> includes shared and unshared rows.
trans-unit.target: 若要提高性能，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection>包括共享和取消共享行。

trans-unit.source: Shared rows share memory to reduce the cost of a large record set.
trans-unit.target: 共享的行共享内存以减少大型的记录集的成本。

trans-unit.source: If your record set is very large, you should be careful to keep the rows shared as much as possible.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的记录集非常大，你应小心地保证尽可能多地共享的行。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that owns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 拥有 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Adds one or more rows to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 将一个或多个行添加到集合中。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new row to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 向集合添加新行。

trans-unit.source: The index of the new row.
trans-unit.target: 新行的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Add> overload adds rows that are based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Add>重载将基于的行添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: The new row is shared, if possible.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能，被共享的新行。

trans-unit.source: Be sure that the row specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A> property can be shared for best scalability.
trans-unit.target: 请确保在指定的行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A>属性可以共享的最佳可伸缩性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when new rows are added.
trans-unit.target: 添加新行时，控件中的行未自动排序。

trans-unit.source: To sort new rows into their correct position, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded?displayProperty=nameWithType> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要对新的行进行排序为正确的位置，调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>中的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: You might also want to call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> event handler to sort the rows when the user modifies a cell.
trans-unit.target: 你可能还想要调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>中的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged>事件处理程序时在用户修改某个单元格的行进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Due to a bug, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.AddRange%2A> method will make your application stop responding if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> property is `true` and the row for new records is selected.
trans-unit.target: 由于存在 bug，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.AddRange%2A>方法将使你的应用程序停止响应如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>属性是`true`和选择用于新纪录的行。

trans-unit.source: To work around this bug, you must cancel the selection of the row before calling this method, and then reselect the row.
trans-unit.target: 若要解决此 bug，您必须取消之前调用此方法中，选择该行，然后重新选择行。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> 值的按位组合，指示指定行的状态。

trans-unit.source: Inserts one or more rows into the collection.
trans-unit.target: 向集合插入一行或多行。

trans-unit.source: The position at which to insert the rows.
trans-unit.target: 要插入行的位置。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows to insert into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 要插入到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection" /> 的行数。

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified number of rows into the collection at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 在集合的指定位置插入指定数量的行。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Insert%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> method adds rows that are based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Insert%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法将添加为基础的行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: The new row is shared, if possible.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能，被共享的新行。

trans-unit.source: Be sure that the row specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A> property can be shared for best scalability.
trans-unit.target: 请确保在指定的行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate%2A>属性可以共享的最佳可伸缩性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when new rows are added.
trans-unit.target: 添加新行时，控件中的行未自动排序。

trans-unit.source: To sort new rows into their correct position, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded?displayProperty=nameWithType> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要对新的行进行排序为正确的位置，调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>中的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: You might also want to call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> event handler to sort the rows when the user modifies a cell.
trans-unit.target: 你可能还想要调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>中的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged>事件处理程序时在用户修改某个单元格的行进行排序。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> is less than zero or greater than the number of rows in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowIndex" /> 小于零或大于集合中的行数。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> 小于 1。

trans-unit.source: The associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control is performing one of the following actions that temporarily prevents new rows from being added:
trans-unit.target: 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控件正在执行以下操作之一，该操作暂时禁止添加新行：

trans-unit.source: Selecting all cells in the control.
trans-unit.target: 选择控件中的所有单元格。

trans-unit.source: Clearing the selection.
trans-unit.target: 清除选择。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: This operation would insert a frozen row after unfrozen rows or an unfrozen row before frozen rows.
trans-unit.target: 此操作将在未冻结的行之后插入一个冻结的行，或在冻结的行之前插入一个未冻结的行。

trans-unit.source: The position at which to insert the row.

trans-unit.target: 用于填充新行的单元格的对象变量数。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a row into the collection at the specified position, and populates the cells with the specified objects.
trans-unit.target: 在集合中的指定位置插入一行，并用指定的对象填充单元格。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Insert%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Object%5B%5D%29> method adds an unshared row to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.Insert%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Object%5B%5D%29>方法添加到非共享的行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection>。

trans-unit.target: 若要对新的行进行排序为正确的位置，调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>中的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: You might also want to call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> event handler to sort the rows when the user modifies a cell.
trans-unit.target: 你可能还想要调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>中的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged>事件处理程序时在用户修改某个单元格的行进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Due to a bug, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertRange%2A> method will make your application stop responding if any rows with an index greater than `rowIndex` are selected.
trans-unit.target: 由于存在 bug，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertRange%2A>方法将确保你的应用程序停止响应如果任何行具有索引大于`rowIndex`选择。

trans-unit.source: To work around this bug, you must cancel the selection of these rows before calling this method, and reselect the rows afterward.
trans-unit.target: 若要解决此 bug，必须取消选择这些行在调用此方法之前和之后重新选择行。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the code example in this topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅本主题中的代码示例。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.InsertRange%2A> method to insert rows before selected rows to work around the bug indicated in the Remarks section.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.OnCollectionChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.

trans-unit.source: This method is being called from a handler for one of the following <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> events:
trans-unit.target: 正在从以下 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 事件之一的处理程序调用此方法：

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is equal to the number of rows in the collection and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> is set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 等于集合中的行数，<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 属性被设置为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control is bound to an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList" /> implementation with <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowRemove" /> and <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsChangeNotification" /> property values that are not both <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控件被绑定到 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList" /> 实现，<see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowRemove" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsChangeNotification" /> 属性值不全为 <see langword="true" />。
